title: Julian Smith – 2022 Comments on Rishi Sunak Becoming Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Julian Smith, the Conservative MP for Skipton and Ripon, on Twitter on 21 October 2022.
content:
I back Rishi Sunak to be our next PM. He has the plan and credibility to:
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers
  *[OECD]: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
  *[ESA]: Employment and Support Allowance
  *[
  ESA
 ]: Employment and Support Allowance

– restore financial stability, help get inflation down & deliver sustainable tax cuts over time; and  
– unite the Conservatives by bringing the best talent into govt to deliver for the British people.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers
  *[OECD]: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
  *[ESA]: Employment and Support Allowance
  *[
  ESA
 ]: Employment and Support Allowance
